title: Howard Grotts Recovering from Spinal Fractures and Brain Injury Sustained in Breck Epic Crash
content:
The 31-year-old off-road pro is at a Denver rehab facility and hopes to return home to Durango within the next week.

Read the full article at Howard Grotts Recovering from Spinal Fractures and Brain Injury Sustained in Breck Epic Crash on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
